newsitem.title: USA: Technology Solutions up on strong outlook.
newsitem.headline: Technology Solutions up on strong outlook.

text.p: Shares of Technology Solutions Co rose 3-3/4 to 27 on Friday after the company reported strong fiscal third quarter earnings and gave an optimistic outlook, analysts said.

"They reported a very strong quarter yesterday," said Joseph Vafi, an analyst for Brean, Murray & Co. "On the call (conference with analysts), management was optimistic about continued strong growth for the company."

On Thursday, Technology Solutions, which provides computer systems integration and consulting services, reported third quarter earnings of $0.22 a share versus $0.05 last year, in line with expectations.
Analysts said the stock had fallen recently as momentum buyers pulled out of the general industry.

"The stock was off 47 percent from the high mostly on rumors...including one that said they would miss the quarter," said Brian Maimone, an analyst with Furman Selz. "In fact the quarter was strong across all business lines. There is no fundamental change in their business."
The 52-week high for Technology Solutions is 47-1/8.
